IF(NOT CMAKE_HOST_WIN32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

### VERSION ###
DKSET(UPX_MAJOR_VERSION 3)
DKSET(UPX_MINOR_VERSION 95)
DKSET(UPX_VERSION upx-${UPX_MAJOR_VERSION}.${UPX_MINOR_VERSION}-win64)

### INSTALL ###
IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/${UPX_VERSION})	
	DKINSTALL(https://github.com/upx/upx/releases/download/v${UPX_MAJOR_VERSION}.${UPX_MINOR_VERSION}/${UPX_VERSION}.zip upx-win64 ${UPX_VERSION})
ENDIF()
DKSET(UPX ${3RDPARTY}/UPX_VERSION)
